snippet: The discovery of the girl around midnight on Wednesday provided a glimmer of relief after a grisly and murky shooting deaths of two parents and a grandmother in the Alps.
abstract: Four-year-old girl is discovered alive at the scene of a gruesome and murky attack that left four people dead, including her parents and grandmother, on a forest road in the French Alps; police are investigating theory that shootings were the result of an armed robbery gone awry.

byline.contributor: John F. Burns contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The discovery of the girl around midnight on Wednesday provided a glimmer of relief after a grisly and murky shooting deaths of two parents and a grandmother in the Alps.

headline.seo: French Police Nearby, Girl Crouches for 8 Hours in Car With Slain Relatives
headline.main: French Police Nearby, Girl Hides in Car for Hours Under Relatives’ Corpses
headline.print_headline: French Police Nearby, Girl Hides in Car for Hours Under Relatives’ Corpses
